definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
(of animals) to give birth/to foal, to whelp etc

sentences.english: Cubs need to be taught hunting.
sentences.chinese: 小狼崽需要教授狩猎技巧。

sentences.english: Michael K. Nichols Tiger Carrying Cub, India, 1997
sentences.chinese: 叨著幼崽转移的老虎，印度，1997。

sentences.english: Cubs are first given plain meat that is followed by meat covered with skin.
sentences.chinese: 小狼崽首先得到的是纯肉，之后才会得到带皮的肉。

sentences.english: The meat is always found by cubs who won’t be hungry due to that.
sentences.chinese: 因为这样，肉总是被一些并不饿的小狼崽发现。

sentences.english: Whereas female cheetahs live solitary lives unless they have cubes.
sentences.chinese: 而母猎豹则过着孤独的生活，除非她们有幼崽。

sentences.english: Shaun Ellis looks at a wolf cub.
sentences.chinese: 图中，埃利斯注视著一只狼崽。

sentences.english: It's a bold mouse that breeds in the cat's ear.
sentences.chinese: 再大胆的老鼠也不敢在猫耳朵里下崽。

sentences.english: About ten days ago, cat gave birth to 4 kittens.
sentences.chinese: 大约十几天前，花猫生了4只猫崽。

sentences.english: Next year the bearded bear will bear a bear baby in the rear.
sentences.chinese: 明年长胡子的熊将在后方生一只可爱的崽。

sentences.english: Mothers give birth to a single infant, which she cares for until the age of two.
sentences.chinese: 当母猩猩生下小幼崽时会照顾它至两岁。

sentences.english: The pups looked to be the same age as the pup on his porch.
sentences.chinese: 小狼崽看起来和门廊上的小狗崽一般年纪。

sentences.english: A species that resembles a wolf puppy that never grows up may have slowly evolved in this way.
sentences.chinese: 就像这样，一种类似于狼崽的物种开始慢慢的进化着。

sentences.english: For Mr Liu insists one of his sheep has given birth to a dog.
sentences.chinese: 因为刘乃应的一只母绵羊竟然生下了一只“狗崽崽”。

sentences.english: Cows lactate for up to ten months.
sentences.chinese: 牛可以为幼崽哺乳10个月。

sentences.english: That species would retain its puppy-like behaviors, such as
sentences.chinese: 就像这样，一种类似于狼崽的物种开始慢慢的进化着。

sentences.english: Next age the bearded bear be to bear a dear honey in the rear.
sentences.chinese: 下一年，长胡子的熊将在后方产一头可爱的小崽。

definition: (of animals) to give birth/to foal, to whelp etc
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
(pet name for a baby or small child)
